question: I had a mild stroke about 2 months ago and the last monthI have been having a brown discharge from my vagina.  It occursthe same time of day and then quits and starts again the next day.  I also found out I have diabetes.  I am taking insulinand it seems to be working just fine.  I feel fine and can'tfigure out what the discharge is from.  Could it be some ofthe medications I am on?  Plavix once a day, altace, oneaspirin, metformin, actos, and lantus insulin.  Please tellme what could be going on.  I personally think it is fromthe Plavix, but I don't know.  Thanks for any help you cangive me.
title: Brown discharge 15 years after hysterectomy and ooforectomy
